Welcome to TeachTech

Learn

Learn More

What you will learn...

TeachTech will allow you learn a wide variety of technologies ranging from web development to games design to artificial Intelligence

Web Development

You will learn languages such as HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript, and learn technologies such as ReactJS, AngularJS and VueJS

Games Design

You will learn languages such as C++, C# and Python, and learn technologies such as Unreal Engine 4, Unity and PyGame

Machine Learning

You will learn languages such as Python and R, and learn technologies such as Scikit-Learn, TensorFlow and PyTorch

Scripting

You will learn languages such as Python, and learn technologies such as the Requests library, Beautiful Soup, Selenium and Scrapy

Our Teachers

We have excellent teachers who are specialised in their set of technologies to give you the best teaching experience
